name: Valla
title: Demon Hunter
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Hungering Arrow
abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 140 damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies dealing 80 damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: Deal 165 damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 seconds deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

heroics.name: Strafe
heroics.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

heroics.name: Rain of Vengeance
heroics.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.
